entry.title: Not Overflow - SMART work pays off
entry.content:
In Not Overflow, we love discovering patterns. We will tell you how to come up with solutions for 10 problems on Leetcode in 20 minutes (This doesnâ€™t include coding time since it differs from person to person) by finding patterns and understanding the core knowledge. We will also provide information on system design interview preparation and some techniques to be more productive during the preparation. This is important since we all have limited time!

Check out Archives to see all the articles.

If you have any question/feedback or would like to join in our team, please drop an email to hi.notoverflow@gmail.com.
